and the others aim for Cavebris's room,"},{"lineNumber":172823,"originalJapaneseLine":"地下水路を進む。","translatedEnglishLine":"advancing through the underground waterways."},{"lineNumber":172824,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":172825,"originalJapaneseLine":"地面に耳を当てていたかなみが","translatedEnglishLine":"Kanami, who had her ear pressed to the ground,"},{"lineNumber":172826,"originalJapaneseLine":"音もなく立ち上がる。","translatedEnglishLine":"stood up silently."},{"lineNumber":172827,"originalJapaneseLine":"「オーケー、もう進んでも大丈夫よ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Okay, it's safe to move forward now.\""},{"lineNumber":172828,"originalJapaneseLine":"「敵か？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Enemies?\""},{"lineNumber":172829,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん、この先500メートル先くらいを","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, something passed about 500 meters ahead...\""},{"lineNumber":172830,"originalJapaneseLine":"　通り過ぎていったわ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"It went past this way...\""},{"lineNumber":172831,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なーんか、敵の数が増えてきたな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Somehow, the number of enemies is increasing.\""},{"lineNumber":172832,"originalJapaneseLine":"「当然、私達を捜してるんだと思う。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Of course, I think they're searching for us."},{"lineNumber":172833,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この辺りは道が入り組んでるから","translatedEnglishLine":"Because the paths here are so tangled,"},{"lineNumber":172834,"originalJapaneseLine":"　助かってるけど……」","translatedEnglishLine":"we're managing to stay safe...\""},{"lineNumber":172835,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふーん、怖いね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, scary, huh.\""},{"lineNumber":172836,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm?\""},{"lineNumber":172837,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……なに？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...What?\""},{"lineNumber":172838,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前、感情あるんじゃないか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You probably have emotions, don't you?\""},{"lineNumber":172839,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん、あるよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, I do."},{"lineNumber":172840,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人形じゃあるまいし」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm not a doll, after all.\""},{"lineNumber":172841,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……お前な」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...You know,\""},{"lineNumber":172842,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いい傾向であろうな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's a good sign."},{"lineNumber":172843,"originalJapaneseLine":"　感情は心の豊かさを保つ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Emotions keep the heart rich."},{"lineNumber":172844,"originalJapaneseLine":"　好きなものが増えるのは良いことだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"It's a good thing to have more things you like.\""},{"lineNumber":172845,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうなの？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is that so?\""},{"lineNumber":172846,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、世界丸ごと好きになるといい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, you should love the whole world.\""},{"lineNumber":172847,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんで？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Why?\""},{"lineNumber":172848,"originalJapaneseLine":"「良いことがあるから」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Because good things will happen.\""},{"lineNumber":172849,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふーん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm."},{"lineNumber":172850,"originalJapaneseLine":"　世界はよく分からないけど、","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't really understand the world,"},{"lineNumber":172851,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あるじは褒めてくれるし好き」","translatedEnglishLine":"but I like my master because he praises me.\""},{"lineNumber":172852,"originalJapaneseLine":"「後、ミラクルも好き」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Also, I like Miracle.\""},{"lineNumber":172853,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん、そうか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, is that so?\""},{"lineNumber":172854,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前案外面倒見いいよな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You're surprisingly caring, aren't you?\""},{"lineNumber":172855,"originalJapaneseLine":"「余はこう見えて偉大にして慈愛溢れる王。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Despite how I look, I am a great and benevolent king."},{"lineNumber":172856,"originalJapaneseLine":"　意外と子供好きなのだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Unexpectedly, I like children.\""},{"lineNumber":172857,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...\""},{"lineNumber":172858,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん？　どうした、シャリエラ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hm? What's wrong, Shaliera?\""},{"lineNumber":172859,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……嫌いな二人組が来た」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...The two I dislike have come.\""},{"lineNumber":172860,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うわーーん！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Waaah!"},{"lineNumber":172861,"originalJapaneseLine":"　シャリエラようやく見つけたにゃんー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Shaliera, I finally found you, nya~!\""},{"lineNumber":172862,"originalJapaneseLine":"「びえええぇーーん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Bieeeehhh!\""},{"lineNumber":172863,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケイブニャンとケイブワンが","translatedEnglishLine":"Cave-nyan and Cave-wan"},{"lineNumber":172864,"originalJapaneseLine":"シャリエラに飛びついた。","translatedEnglishLine":"jumped on Shaliera."},{"lineNumber":172865,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひょいっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hiyoi!\" (sound of swiftly grabbing or jumping)"},{"lineNumber":172866,"originalJapaneseLine":"「にぎゃー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nigyaa!\" (a surprised or pained cry)"},{"lineNumber":172867,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして、水路の中に突っ込んだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Then, they plunged into the waterway."},{"lineNumber":172868,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぶぺっ、ぺっ、けほけほ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Bupet, pet, keho keho.\" (spitting and coughing sounds)"},{"lineNumber":172869,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんで避けるにゃん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Why are you dodging, nya!\""},{"lineNumber":172870,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんとなく……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Somehow..."},{"lineNumber":172871,"originalJapaneseLine":"　で、なに？」","translatedEnglishLine":"So, what is it?"},{"lineNumber":172872,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ニャンはいっぱい傷ついてるにゃん！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nyan has lots of injuries, nya!"},{"lineNumber":172873,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ワンもいっぱい傷ついてるにゃん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Wan also has lots of injuries, nya!\""},{"lineNumber":172874,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うんうん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, yeah.\""},{"lineNumber":172875,"originalJapaneseLine":"「慰めるにゃん！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'll comfort you, nya!"},{"lineNumber":172876,"originalJapaneseLine":"　取り込んだばかりのバスタオルのように","translatedEnglishLine":"Like a freshly taken-in bath towel,"},{"lineNumber":172877,"originalJapaneseLine":"　優しく温かく包み込むにゃん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I will gently and warmly wrap you up, nya!\""},{"lineNumber":172878,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え……やだ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh... no...\""},{"lineNumber":172879,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh!?\""},{"lineNumber":172880,"originalJapaneseLine":"「びえーーーん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Bieeeen!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははははははははははは！」
ランス達がケイブリスの部屋を目指して
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others aim for Cavebris's room,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地面に耳を当てていたかなみが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kanami, who had her ear pressed to the ground,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「オーケー、もう進んでも大丈夫よ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Okay, it's safe to move forward now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん、この先500メートル先くらいを
「なーんか、敵の数が増えてきたな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Somehow, the number of enemies is increasing."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「当然、私達を捜してるんだと思う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Of course, I think they're searching for us.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この辺りは道が入り組んでるから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because the paths here are so tangled,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前、感情あるんじゃないか」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm not a doll, after all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 感情は心の豊かさを保つ。
好きなものが増えるのは良いことだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a good thing to have more things you like."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、世界丸ごと好きになるといい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, you should love the whole world."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界はよく分からないけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't really understand the world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あるじは褒めてくれるし好き」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but I like my master because he praises me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「余はこう見えて偉大にして慈愛溢れる王。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Despite how I look, I am a great and benevolent king.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意外と子供好きなのだ」
「ん？　どうした、シャリエラ」
シャリエラようやく見つけたにゃんー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shaliera, I finally found you, nya~!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブニャンとケイブワンが
シャリエラに飛びついた。
そして、水路の中に突っ込んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, they plunged into the waterway.
"Bupet, pet, keho keho." (spitting and coughing sounds)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ニャンはいっぱい傷ついてるにゃん！
ワンもいっぱい傷ついてるにゃん！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wan also has lots of injuries, nya!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 取り込んだばかりのバスタオルのように
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Like a freshly taken-in bath towel,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 優しく温かく包み込むにゃん！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will gently and warmly wrap you up, nya!"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははははははははははは！」
ランス達がケイブリスの部屋を目指して
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others aim for Cavebris's room,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地面に耳を当てていたかなみが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kanami, who had her ear pressed to the ground,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「オーケー、もう進んでも大丈夫よ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Okay, it's safe to move forward now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん、この先500メートル先くらいを
「なーんか、敵の数が増えてきたな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Somehow, the number of enemies is increasing."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「当然、私達を捜してるんだと思う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Of course, I think they're searching for us.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この辺りは道が入り組んでるから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because the paths here are so tangled,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前、感情あるんじゃないか」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm not a doll, after all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 感情は心の豊かさを保つ。
好きなものが増えるのは良いことだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a good thing to have more things you like."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ、世界丸ごと好きになるといい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, you should love the whole world."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界はよく分からないけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't really understand the world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あるじは褒めてくれるし好き」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but I like my master because he praises me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「余はこう見えて偉大にして慈愛溢れる王。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Despite how I look, I am a great and benevolent king.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意外と子供好きなのだ」
「ん？　どうした、シャリエラ」
シャリエラようやく見つけたにゃんー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shaliera, I finally found you, nya~!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブニャンとケイブワンが
シャリエラに飛びついた。
そして、水路の中に突っ込んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, they plunged into the waterway.
"Bupet, pet, keho keho." (spitting and coughing sounds)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ニャンはいっぱい傷ついてるにゃん！
ワンもいっぱい傷ついてるにゃん！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wan also has lots of injuries, nya!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 取り込んだばかりのバスタオルのように
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Like a freshly taken-in bath towel,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 優しく温かく包み込むにゃん！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will gently and warmly wrap you up, nya!"
